TextView.android:text: Look around, Till Soil and find in mines
Chop trere and stumps and mine rocks (Stumps require copper axe)
Only 3 neeeded. Grow gold quality crops from differant seasons
Onyl 5 needed. Barn and a cow (7.5k,350W,150S), Coop and 2 chickens (5.2k, 300W, 100S), Big coop and duck (11.2k, 400W, 150S), Big barn ang goat (16k, 450W, 200S)
Only 6 Needed!. Made in different machines and Gathered from fruit trees
Cought in rivers. all between 6am and 7pm. all execpt tiger trout in spring. sunfish only on sunny days, catfish and shad only on rainy days, tiger trout in fall or winter any weather
Cought in lake, All between 6am-7pm, most in all seasons and weather except sturgeon that is onlu in summer or winter
Cought in ocean, All 6am-7pm, Sardine all except summer any weather, the rest can all be cough in summer but red snapper has to rain
Cought in river or lake (Walleye), River (Bream), Ocean (Eel), All 6pm to 2am, walleye and Eel has to rain, Walleye is fall or winter, Eel is spring or fall and Bream all seasons
Only 5 Needed! Crab pot with bait in Ocean or freshwater (you can also get enough tru foraging on the beach)
Smelt 5 of a ore to make a bar do not forget the coal
Found on different floor of the mine. Eath crystal (1-39), Frozer tear (40-79), Fire quartz (80-120), Quartz all floors
Only 2 Needed, Killing slime, Bats, Ghost or Shadow thing in the mines
Tree tapping, Summer foraging in secret woods (steel axes needed), Deluxe barn and pig (25k, 550W, 300S), Summer crop, House uppgrade (10k,400W)
Mines, Beach foraging, Summer/fall Crop, Ducks, Summer crops in year 2+ (traveling cart before year 2 start is also posible)
Mines, Winter beach foraging, Mountain lake
Fruit trees that bear fruit in fall, Summer/fall crop (hay as a secondary drop)
Tree tapping, Keg with fruit, Fruit treee tha bear fruit in fall, Deluxe coop and rabbit (20k, 500W, 200S)
